mapper.select: SELECT message.id, user.fullname, message.urId AS sender, temp.createTime AS createTime, message.content FROM messagenotification INNER JOIN message ON messagenotification.meId = message.id AND message.deleteFlg = '0' INNER JOIN ( SELECT messagenotification.urId, MAX(messagenotification.createTime) AS createTime, message.cnId FROM message INNER JOIN messagenotification ON messagenotification.meId = message.id AND messagenotification.deleteFlg = '0' AND messagenotification.urId = #{urId} AND messagenotification.isRead = 0 INNER JOIN conversation ON message.cnId = conversation.id GROUP BY conversation.id ) AS temp ON messagenotification.createTime = temp.createTime AND messagenotification.deleteFlg = '0' AND messagenotification.urId = temp.urId AND message.cnId = temp.cnId INNER JOIN user ON message.urId = user.id
mapper.update: UPDATE messagenotification SET isRead = 1 WHERE isRead = 0 AND urId = #{urId} AND meId IN ( SELECT meId FROM message INNER JOIN conversation ON message.cnId = conversation.id AND conversation.topic = #{topic} )
mapper.select: SELECT user.fullname AS username, user.id, message.createTime, message.content, messagenotification.isRead FROM message INNER JOIN conversation ON message.cnId = conversation.id AND conversation.topic = #{topic} AND conversation.deleteFlg = '0' INNER JOIN user ON message.urID = user.id AND user.deleteFlg = '0' INNER JOIN messagenotification ON message.id = messagenotification.meId AND messagenotification.deleteFlg = '0' AND messagenotification.urId = #{urId} WHERE message.deleteFlg = '0' ORDER BY message.createTime DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{size}
